namespace.__comment: Qualifies the name of the dataset. E.g. daf.schema.mobility

type.__comment: It must be 'record' at the root level of the Avro Schema

aliases.__comment: Other aliases of the dataset. It can be used to store old names

type.__comment: It can be a json object for complex type, or an array of string for primitive types (the latter may contains 'null' in case the field can be nullable).

metadata.__comment: JSON object containing metadata information for the field.

required.__comment: It indicates if a field need to be present in the incoming data file (1) or not (0).

field_type.__comment: It describes the type of info contained in the field.

cat.__comment: The most 'in-depth' (or nested) category that better describes the field.

constr.__comment: Constr defines constraints that can be applied to the values of the field

param.__comment: Here param can take different format based on the type of constraint (es. List, String, ecc)

semantics.__comment: Contains the semantic info described into the ontology for the entity described in the field.

@id.__comment: Uri of the object contained in the field.

@context.__comment: Array of URIs that are associated with the object described by the considered field.
